root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 2-b-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 2. End hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture2.b Correct and prevent restrictions and distortions hampering the functioning of world agricultural markets, including through the parallel elimination of all forms of agricultural export subsidies and all export measures having equivalent effect, in accordance with mandate of the Doha Development Round2.b.1 Export subsidies in the agricultural sectorThis is the total amount of export subsidies granted in the agriculture sectorSum of export subsidies granted in the agriculture sectorNot available
